snippet.title: Space Quest 2099 Intro Titles
snippet.description:
Space Quest 2099 is a stylised, multiplayer, sci-fi, action-driven first person shooter. Think Quake 3 meets Command and Conquer, complete with live action cutscenes, terribly cheesy one liners, and an utterly balls to the wall stupid cooperative campaign!

This game is basically an old school project that flew WAYYYY out of control. I've tinkered around on and off with Space Quest for the past couple of years ; from its inception as a themed tech demo, all the way to the WORLD'S GREATEST SPACE ADVENTURE!*

Programming, level design, acting, character design, writing, directing, artistic design, playtesting, and quality assurance by the handsome young man at Lever Software - all on a budget of £40!

Special thanks to Blake Robinson's Synthetic Orchestra for royalty free soundtrack use.

*Taste may vary, you might prefer a space adventure that's little more high budget
